mapper.select: select table1."cnDate" as date, ma.name, table1.code, table1."totalRequest",table1."successCnt", table1."failCnt", ma.logo, ma.industry from (select to_char(ph."reqDate", 'yyyyMMDD') "cnDate",ri."code", count(*) as "totalRequest", count(1)FILTER(where ph."resCode" = '200' ) as "successCnt",count(1)FILTER(where ph."resCode" != '200' ) as "failCnt" from public."providerHistory" as ph join public."reqInfo" as ri on ri.id = ph."reqInfoId" group by ri."code", "cnDate") as table1 join public."mdAgency" as ma on ma.code = table1.code;

select table1."cnDate" as date, ma.name, table1.code, table1."totalRequest",table1."successCnt", table1."failCnt", ma.logo, ma.industry from (select to_char(ph."reqDate", 'yyyyMMDD') "cnDate",ri."code", count(*) as "totalRequest", count(1)FILTER(where ph."resCode" = '200' ) as "successCnt",count(1)FILTER(where ph."resCode" != '200' ) as "failCnt" from public."providerHistory" as ph join public."reqInfo" as ri on ri.id = ph."reqInfoId" group by ri."code", "cnDate") as table1 join public."mdAgency" as ma on ma.code = table1.code where table1."cnDate" = #{date} and table1.code = #{orgCode};
select * from public."errorCode" order by error asc;

select table1.date,table1.code, table1.hh, table2."totalRequest",table2."successCnt", table2."failCnt" from (SELECT to_char(ph."reqDate",'yyyyMMDD') date, ri.code, hh FROM public."providerHistory" as ph cross JOIN (SELECT to_char(generate_series( TO_CHAR(NOW(),'YYYYMMDD 00:00')::timestamp, TO_CHAR(NOW(),'YYYYMMDD 23:00')::timestamp, '1 hours'),'HH24:MI') as "hh") AS "time" join public."reqInfo" as ri on ri.id = ph."reqInfoId" group by to_char(ph."reqDate", 'yyyyMMDD'), ri.code,hh ) as "table1" left join (select to_char(ph."reqDate", 'yyyyMMDD') "cnDate",to_char(ph."reqDate", 'HH24:00') "cnHour",ri."code", count(*) as "totalRequest", count(1)FILTER(where ph."resCode" = '200' ) as "successCnt",count(1)FILTER(where ph."resCode" != '200' ) as "failCnt" from public."providerHistory" as ph join public."reqInfo" as ri on ri.id = ph."reqInfoId" group by ri."code", "cnDate", "cnHour") as "table2" on table1."date" = table2."cnDate" and table1.hh = table2."cnHour" where table1.code = #{code} and date = #{date} order by hh asc;
